claim_card.claim: Operational correlates are proposed mapping Δ/GC/CF/UD to physical implementation variables: differential current flows, coupled oscillator patterns, phase-dependent gate tuning, rhythmic power cycling.
claim_card.test_hook: Build a toy system where each correlate is measurable; test whether the mapped signals co-vary as predicted during regime changes.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Δ = differential current flows ... GC = coupled oscillator patterns ... CF = phase-dependent gate tuning ... UD = rhythmic power cycling
